messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] (unknown)
messages.msgSnippet: It says: RENOUNCE THIS FILTHY WORLD AND ATTAIN THE PURE LAND. It s, of course, a Jodo motto. Do I win something?? cepo
messages.messageBody:
It says:

RENOUNCE THIS FILTHY WORLD AND ATTAIN THE PURE LAND.

It's, of course, a Jodo motto.

Do I win something??

cepo

messages.msgSnippet: ... No problem. Now somebody may be able to help you :) Unfortunately, I don t remember what it is exactly. All I can remember off the top of my head is that
messages.messageBody:
--- simionescu silviu <zabara_klan@...> wrote:

> i'm sorry, i didn't provided to much information, my
> english writing is verry bad. the banner that i'm
> talking about it's at the samurai arhives, at
> banners , at page nr.3.Thanks

No problem. Now somebody may be able to help you :)

Unfortunately, I don't remember what it is exactly.
All I can remember off the top of my head is that it
has something to do with the motto of the Jodo sect of
Pure Land Buddhism, to which Ieyasu belonged.
